Constructor Detail

BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas

public BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                                   int pHeight)
Uses BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888.

Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).

BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas

public BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                                   int pHeight,
                                   BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat pBitmapTextureFormat)
Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pBitmapTextureFormat - use BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888 for BitmapTextureAtlas MAGIC_CONSTANT with transparency and BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat.RGB_565 for BitmapTextureAtlasMAGIC_CONSTANT without transparency.

BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas

public BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                                   int pHeight,
                                   ITextureAtlas.ITextureAtlasStateListener<IBitmapTextureAtlasSource> pTextureStateListener)
Uses BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888.

Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pTextureStateListener - to be informed when this BitmapTextureAtlas is loaded, unloaded or a ITextureAtlasSource failed to load.

BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas

public BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                                   int pHeight,
                                   BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat pBitmapTextureFormat,
                                   ITextureAtlas.ITextureAtlasStateListener<IBitmapTextureAtlasSource> pTextureStateListener)
Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pBitmapTextureFormat - use BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888 for BitmapTextureAtlas MAGIC_CONSTANT with transparency and BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat.RGB_565 for BitmapTextureAtlasMAGIC_CONSTANT without transparency.
pTextureStateListener - to be informed when this BitmapTextureAtlas is loaded, unloaded or a ITextureAtlasSource failed to load.

BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas

public BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                                   int pHeight,
                                   TextureOptions pTextureOptions)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException
Uses BitmapTextureAtlas.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888.

Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pTextureOptions - the (quality) settings of the BitmapTexture.

IllegalArgumentException
